Detailed Description

template<unsigned D, unsigned Dmin>
class Extrude< D, Dmin, Dmin >

Specialization of Extrude<D,Dmin,Dmax> to end recursion.

Parameters:
D Dimension of the vector space we're working in
Dmin Dimension being tapered into
Author:
Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>

Create an Extrude object from a point.

Todo:
Guard against bad template parameters:
  • Dmin >= Dmax
  • Dmin or Dmax >= D
  • Dmin or Dmax >= vertex_data::_dimension
